languages.text: "Шшш... Бездмное создание. Племя найдт тебя. Племя заберт жертву".
"Hshhh... Senseless crture. The tribe will fnd you. The tribe will have its scrifice."
languages.original_text: "Шшш... Бездмное создание. Племя найдт тебя. Племя заберт жертву".

traits.locale_text: "Hshhh... Senseless crture. The tribe will find you. The tribe will have its scrifice."
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: « Hshhh... Stupide crture. La tribu vous trovra. La tribu aura son scrifice. »
languages.original_text: "Hshhh... Senseless crture. The tribe will fnd you. The tribe will have its scrifice."

traits.locale_text: « Hshhh... Stupide crture. La tribu vous trovra. La tribu aura son scrifice. »
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: “嘻嘻嘻……愚蠢的绳物。族人会早到你的，族人要得到纪品。”
languages.original_text: "Hshhh... Senseless crture. The tribe will fnd you. The tribe will have its scrifice."

traits.locale_text: “嘻嘻嘻……愚蠢的绳物。族人会早到你的，族人要得到纪品。”
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: 「フウゥゥ…愚かなイキモノだ。ワレラ部族はお前を見ツケル。ワレラ部族はイケニエを手に入レル」
languages.original_text: "Hshhh... Senseless crture. The tribe will fnd you. The tribe will have its scrifice."

traits.locale_text: 「フウゥゥ…愚かなイキモノだ。ワレラ部族はお前を見ツケル。ワレラ部族はイケニエを手に入レル」
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: "Hshhh... Nichtsntzige Kreatur. Der Stamm wird Euch fnden. Der Stamm wird sein Opfer bekmmen."
languages.original_text: "Hshhh... Senseless crture. The tribe will fnd you. The tribe will have its scrifice."

traits.locale_text: "Hshhh... Nichtsntzige Kreatur. Der Stamm wird Euch fnden. Der Stamm wird sein Opfer bekmmen."
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: «Hshhh... Critura estpida. Tribu te encntra. Tribu tiene su scrificio».
languages.original_text: "Hshhh... Senseless crture. The tribe will fnd you. The tribe will have its scrifice."

traits.locale_text: «Hshhh... Critura estpida. Tribu te encntra. Tribu tiene su scrificio».
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: "Şşş. Akılsız yrtık. Kabile seni bulck. Kabile kurbnını alck."
languages.original_text: "Hshhh... Senseless crture. The tribe will fnd you. The tribe will have its scrifice."

traits.locale_text: "Şşş. Akılsız yrtık. Kabile seni bulck. Kabile kurbnını alck."
